content: I've also been trying to make my bed as soon as I get up, and do a quick wipe-down of the kitchen counters after dinner. These small habits have been making a big difference in the overall cleanliness and tidiness of my home. Do you have any advice on how to remember to take out the trash and recycling on the designated days? I've been setting reminders on my phone, but I'm still working on making it a consistent habit.
